documentaries.title: The Batman
documentaries.synopsis: When a sadistic serial killer emerges in Gotham, Batman uncovers corruption that connects to his own family while facing the challenge of confronting a ruthless villain.

documentaries.title: Terrifier 2
documentaries.synopsis: Art the Clown returns to terrorize a new group of victims, this time haunting a young woman and her brother on Halloween night.

documentaries.title: Deadpool
documentaries.synopsis: Wade Wilson, a former special forces operative turned mercenary, gains extraordinary healing powers after a rogue experiment, and sets out to track down the man who ruined his life.

documentaries.title: The Flash
documentaries.synopsis: Barry Allen uses his super-speed powers to travel back in time to prevent his mother's death, but this causes unintended consequences that affect the timeline and the fate of the world.

documentaries.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
documentaries.synopsis: Peter Parker seeks help from Doctor Strange to erase the public's memory of him being Spider-Man, leading to a multiverse collision with villains from other realities.

documentaries.title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
documentaries.synopsis: Doctor Strange seeks help from the Scarlet Witch to navigate the multiverse, facing threats from alternate realities and encountering new allies.

documentaries.title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
documentaries.synopsis: Wakanda faces a new threat as T'Challa's legacy is honored and his sister Shuri takes on a leading role in the nation's fight against the powerful Talokan.

documentaries.title: Jurassic World: Dominion
documentaries.synopsis: Dinosaurs now roam freely in the world, and humanity must find a way to coexist with them while facing new dangers, including a genetically engineered threat.

documentaries.title: Avatar: The Way of Water
documentaries.synopsis: Jake Sully and Neytiri, now parents, are forced to protect their family when their peaceful life on Pandora is threatened by external forces and a deadly new adversary.
